Input text to summarize: A gaming computer, also known as a gaming PC, is a specialized personal computer designed for playing PC games at high standards. They typically differ from mainstream personal computers by using high-performance graphics cards, a high core-count CPU with higher raw performance and higher-performance RAM. Gaming PCs are also used for other demanding tasks such as video editing.[1] While often in desktop form, gaming PCs may also be laptops or handhelds.
Summarized text: A gaming computer is a specialized personal computer designed for playing PC games at high standards . They typically differ from mainstream personal computers by using high-performance graphics cards, a high core-count CPU with higher raw performance and higher-performance RAM . Gaming PCs are also used for other demanding tasks such as video editing .
